website_summaries.verdict: This all-natural green coffee bean extract capsule is designed to boost metabolism and increase energy, with 800 milligrams of coffee bean extract per capsule.
pros: Made and packaged in the USA
cons: Some consumers did not experience any of the expected results

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have been using it for 2 years. When I started taking this product I weighed 245 lbs and 1 year later I weighed 167 lbs, something I really thought I would never seen happen after being overweight for the majority of my life. I take this as a supplement to maintain my weight and two years later I have not gained any and am still at 167 which is a good number for me. It really helps with hunger pains and controls my appetite.
customer_reviews.author: Deena

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I am usually skeptical of products that help to lose weight, but this has worked so well for me. My appetite is more controlled, I do not feel the need to snack and I feel like it gives me some extra energy too. I have already lost a few pounds and I started a week ago!
customer_reviews.author: Mahnaz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome probiotic supplement that truly helps with lactose intolerance!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 35 year old woman who is lactose intolerant but, otherwise, healthy. I have been taking probiotics on and off since my mid-twenties to help aid with digestion and, of course, the added benefit to my immune system. I have tried different brands, from the high-end prices to the more basic cheaper brands with fewer strains. I am very pleased with the results of this probiotic! It has the recommended 40 billion CFUs, contains acidophilus (La-14) which is great for lactose intolerance and is very affordable for a probiotic with multiple strains. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful experience
customer_reviews.text: I've had a great experience with this product! So far I have been taking this product for 5 months. I was provided with higher energy without feeling jumpy and I noticed that I didn't feel a need to eat as much. Yes my appetite has decreased. I don't even feel hungry between meals! This pill has been amazing for me, because I love to eat! I made a good choice purchasing this product and will buy again.Good product, shipped fast, at fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn's Voyage

customer_reviews.title: Had successful weight management because of this
customer_reviews.text: Being a mom could sometimes take a toll on you. I have really not noticed how much I've let myself go and gained so much weight until recently. I took a good look at myself and realized that even though I am taking care of my kids, I should also take care of myself. I started with weight management. I found this product through recommendations of friends and I honestly cannot be happier with the results I got from this. I've lost 14 pounds in two months and that is so amazing. I rarely exercised in those two months but I still lost that much weight! So, if you're having second thoughts about buying this, don't. Buy this now!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Li

customer_reviews.title: Superd Product
customer_reviews.text: I think this Green coffee extract is a great supplement for those who are not interested in harsh, dangerous, or scary side effects. Really, all that is necessary is to follow the directions on the container, and do not exceed in the amount. Remember, a "little dab will do ya." No need to overdue it, just let nature take its course with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay B.

customer_reviews.title: Helps aid weight loss
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product and have noticed that it helps aid weight loss. I am trying to watch my diet as well, but I I'm often presented with situations where I need to eat later than desired or eat out, which makes it more likely that I would gain weight. I I have noticed that when I take this, I am not gaining weight when it seems like I should have because of one of the reasons above. In fact, sometimes I lose weight when I know I should have gained it. It also does not make me feel jittery, which is really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Boost I Need In My Goal To Reverse Health Conditions
customer_reviews.text: This product, this brand, helps me have a sharper edge and quicker energy. I have multiple, simultaneous health conditions that cause brain fog, fatigue, neuropathy, etc. I’m not old and I refuse to give in to these conditions, determined to work out, too, to reverse these conditions. This is a helpful tool to get me through tasks and to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Lydialovesbutterflies

customer_reviews.title: 4 Pounds in 5 days.
customer_reviews.text: Before this product I weighed 189. It was delivered September 3rd. As of the 8th I weighed 185. As of right now I am not that active because of corona. The most exercise I get is house work. I really like this product, because it is effective. It is easy to swallow and doesn’t have a taste. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: That taking this product as directed will help lose and maintain that weight loss.
customer_reviews.text: I have taken these as directed for many months and I am thoroughly delighted with their effectiveness. I experienced significant weight loss (about 30 lbs. ) through dietary changes and little else. With the assistance of this supplement I have maintained that loss even though adherence to dietary cautions have adjusted more loosely as seasonal changes have made doing so harder to maintain. With regular consumption however maintaining my weight loss goal has been relatively effortless much to surprise. I highly recommend this product to initially lose and then maintain one's weight loss goals.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. White

customer_reviews.title: Not a magic pill, but no bad effects! 👍
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used Green Coffee Bean Extract Before. I have only used 1/day and haven’t noticed any obvious metabolism effect...though, I was using it in November and December so the fact that I didn’t gain any weight over the holidays may be a good sign 😆 I’ll try to up it to 2/day in January, as the label suggests, and see if I notice any change.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: It's hare to say with 100% certainty that this is the sole reason that I am losing weight, because I couple it with eating right and exercising. However, I can say that it is easy on the stomach and I like the dosage. So many supplements these day have you taking 2 or 3 capsules as a serving. This one is only one capsule!
customer_reviews.author: NorCal311

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY.! DO NOT BUY. THEY DO NOT WORK.
customer_reviews.text: I've been on these for over 2 months almost on my 3rd bottle. I will NOT buy anymore. Have not lost 1 pound.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Mondini

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: My product arrived one day earlier than anticipated and was the most affordable of all the green coffee extract that I looked at. I am using it in conjunction with Intermittent Fasting and the product has already accelerated my weight loss. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Hunter

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! We've purchased this multiple times and will continue to purchase as our supply runs low. There's no reason to switch or look for something else when we are 100% satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: appetite supression
customer_reviews.text: I don't use the product as suggested; I don't take it 1/2 to an hour before eating. I take it instead of eating. It is great at suppressing my appetite. I have started to lose the weight I put on since taking a desk job.
customer_reviews.author: D L P

customer_reviews.title: Good product worth trying
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I chose it because it had many of the different cultures as ingredients. I have been taking it for two weeks now. I can definitely tell a difference. I do not feel as bloated and uncomfortable as I did.
customer_reviews.author: ahardy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I swear this has made me feel lighter mentally and physically. I used to have a very low self-esteem due to being overweight but not anymore. I took this in January to March and lost a total of 16 lbs. I'm taking it again to lose some more weight. I never gained back the 16 lbs that I've lost which is amazing. I think the only side effect it has on me is slight dehydration but that's very easy to counter.
customer_reviews.author: callmepatty_

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this probiotic for almost a month now and I have dropped weight...as well as feel different (in a healthy sense). My stomach feels good, my skin has improved tremendously as I suffer a little with psoriasis at my hairline. It has subsided. I recommend this probiotic.
customer_reviews.author: KeeKee

customer_reviews.title: Initially it worked, but now......
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 2 bottles in total. The first bottle did it's job. Less constipation and made going to the bathroom easy. I didnt have stomach bloating and a noticeable flatter belly. I loved it. Currently working on my 2nd bottle, it does nothing for me. Are the bacteria all dead? Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: XXVII_Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Have not used long enough
customer_reviews.text: Have not used long enough to say, but will update when i am able
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be good quality and cost less than the sports research product with twice the coffee bean extract. So far happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy H

customer_reviews.title: More Energy and decrease in appetite
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this because it gives me energy even on my most sluggish feeling days. I feel like it kicks in quickly. It also helps me eat better due to the decrease in appetite so I am able to control my eating habits better than if I did not take it and became ravenous around lunch and dinner time.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Thankyou
customer_reviews.text: Feels like it’s working, I never take supplements like this but I’m feeling confident that it will help me succeed with my dietary assistance!
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It worked as well as I hoped it would! I felt hungry way more often, which definitely is a good sign if a faster metabolism is what I'm looking for- and it is.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Irby

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps with food sensitivities.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has many food sensitivities. After taking these for only a few days, we began to see results in her digestive reactions or lack thereof. After taking them for a month, it was as though some of her allergies had vanished. Her body is now able to tollerate small doses of the foods that once caused her immediate inflamation/reactions. We must order more:)
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah G.

customer_reviews.title: I think it is worth a try.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it doesn’t have a taste. I feel like it boosts my metabolism.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for maintaining weight and digestive tract

I would recommend this product. Great price and it has black peper for better absobtion. I will be taking these moving forward everyday.

customer_reviews.text: Always use probiotics, they are live bacteria and yeasts that are good for your health, especially your digestive system. Thanks for your product!

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend taking it earlier in the day rather than later
customer_reviews.text: This product is very helpful especially for those having night time cravings. It does has caffeine in it, so for those who are sensitive to caffeine and may have issues sleeping, I'd recommend taking it earlier in the day rather than later. The coffee bean extract is healthy and reliable, results may take a few weeks but they're definitely beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: karen castorino cono

customer_reviews.title: New user!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to probiotic usage and have been on this for about 45 days at my doctor's recommendation. I believe I am benefiting now but I anticipate further effects and improvements are needed in order to make definitive evaluations. I understand I will receive complimentary product for this review but I don't think that colors my statements above. I do like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Larry G. Woodson

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have taken Pepsid and Prilosec for years and wanted to get off them. Also I was getting sick regularly (stomach acid kills germs). I read about using probiotics, digestive enzymes and prebiotics to deal with heartburn. I’m happy to say that I have been off the acid blockers for over 6 months and have only gotten sick once. This product clearly aided in that!
customer_reviews.author: S. D.

customer_reviews.title: The Best for ME
customer_reviews.text: I love this pills. I took twice a day and i don't feel hungry. I usually eat when i come home from work but i felt like im full already. I loose 2 lbs already in 1 week. So i bought another bottle for next month supply. I love this product❤

customer_reviews.text: I feel great while taking this. I’ve taken for about 2 months and love it!! With different vendors, I have felt bloated with an upset stomach. I have felt great with no bad side effects! Love it!

customer_reviews.title: E I E
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this weight loss product because 1. It's EFFECTIVE, 2. It's INEXPENSIVE and 3. It's an EASY way to get fit again. I gained almost 35 lbs last year and am looking to fit back into my old clothes by taking this. I check my weight every week for the past four weeks I've been on this and the average weight I loose per week is 3-4 lbs. Now do the math for my total weight loss so far.

customer_reviews.title: Can't see any difference but I still eat and drink ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't see any difference but I still eat and drink too much. Weird but it does help me sleep I believe. 2 at bedtime. No apparent side effects tho. Give it a try it's cheap enough and see what happens.

product_meta.title: 100% Pure Green Coffee Bean Extract Highest Quality 800 mg Best Weight Loss Formula for Women and Men Natural Diet Pills Fat Burner Metabolism Booster Antioxidant 60 Capsules by Natures Craft
product_meta.description:
Color:Green Coffee BeanOur Green Coffee Bean extract weight loss supplement helps you get rid of stubborn rolls of flab in a natural, holistic way! This premium metabolism booster allows your body to burn additional calories, while also giving you a generous amount of antioxidants. With the help of these powerful diet pills, you can reach your weight loss goals ahead of time and with less effort. 

Natures Craft is your trusted partner in wellness. We use only the most pure, most potent and high quality ingredients available in our all-natural dietary supplements. We do this because we want our products to work for you time and again. We want you to be a customer for life! All of our products are manufactured in the U.S.A. under the strictest cGMP standards.
feature_bullets: Trying to lose weight? Break down stubborn body fat at the source with our Green Coffee Bean supplement, the most premium quality fat burner on the market! These fast acting diet pills boost metabolism for easier, faster slimming

As an all natural weight loss supplement, Green Coffee Bean extract supports your body's metabolism to help you burn more calories throughout the day, whether exercising or at rest. Boost your results and get the fit, toned figure of your dreams!

Green Coffee Bean extract is also rich in antioxidants that promote overall wellness. Because antioxidants fight free radicals, they may also help in slowing the common signs of aging. Support your body in a holistic way!

NO artificial flavors, harmful fillers, GMOs, or other useless ingredients. These vegetarian cellulose capsules are fast dissolving and highly bioavailable so that you get the most benefits from every dose
